title: Multiplayer Web Games: Build your own!
notes:
Multiplayer Snake!

	* Github Repo
		* http://github.com/flukeout/snek
		* Ask us questions and get help by filing issues!

	* Play Online
		* http://multisnek.herokuapp.com/
		* Short link - https://goo.gl/O63CQy

	* Play locally
	* Connect to the Rave network
		* http://172.16.0.64:3000/
		* Controller as phone - http://172.16.0.64:3000/touchpad

	* Silde Deck (not important)
		* http://goo.gl/0Z9Ln9


Other multiplayer experiences

	* Big list of multiplayer games
		* http://iogames.space/

Some cool ones
	* http://slither.io
	* 


Sounds

	* Noise for fun - http://www.noiseforfun.com/browse-sound-effects/
	* Freesound - https://www.freesound.org/
	* Open Game Art - http://opengameart.org/
	* Bfxr (generate 8-bit sounds) http://www.bfxr.net/


Colors

	* Generate color palates - http://tools.medialab.sciences-po.fr/iwanthue/


Gamedev Forums & Communities

	* Reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/gamedev/
	* HTML 5 Game Devs Forum http://www.html5gamedevs.com/index.php
